title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“Mereu stayed with 50 of Angius' 400 sheep, dressed in dirty and ragged canvas clothing and shoes with holes.” [The Des Moines Sunday Register, 6 December 1987. Submitted by Margo Heilman, Des Moines, Iowa.]
